EXTRACTED VALUE: An average shooter that has the ability to be great, but misses out by not using its namesake correctly.
Even with those changes, the game doesn’t come close to the competition.
Ubisoft captured the visual spirit of the show, but the actual gameplay in the first LOST game is not worth the three-season wait.
Just like the empty vacuum that is outer space, Star Trek: Legacy pretty much just sucks. Set your phasers to “pass” on this one.
Such a broken game that you'd be better off waiting for NBA Live 08 to hopefully rectify some critical issues.
It just seems that not much thought has gone into the level design and gameplay beyond “could a five-year-old play this?”.
